moves.2. d4 Bb7 3. Nc3 e6 4. Bf4: I aim at the weak c7 square.
moves.5... Bxe4 6. a3 Bxc3 7. Qxc3: I threaten to regain it with a superior position.
moves.8... Nd7 9. f3 Bb7 10. O-O-O Ngf6 11. Re: I create a pin that while it doesn't last, comes back and destroys him.
moves.11... Nd5 12. Qd2 a6 13. Bc4 Nxf4 14. Qx: I start to prepare a kingside assault.
moves.15... Nf6 16. Ne2 c5 17. Ng3 O-O: ?? THis makes trouble for black. He would have been better off on the queen side.
moves.20. h4: This was overdue. I missed Nd7!! and the attack is over and I lose more material.
moves.20... c3 21. h5 h6: This throws a monkey wrench into my plans.
moves.22. Bd3 b5 23. Ne2: I stop the threat of Nd7.
moves.29... Rc3+ 30. Ka2 Rac8 31. g5: Every spare move goes into the attack.
moves.40. Bxf5 Nxf5 41. Rxf5: The pin is exploited in the worst may possible. My passed pawn will bring home victory!
moves.49. Nh5: He timed out. I was winning anyway.
